dict.acceptation: 痛苦；刻苦；令人厌烦的人[事物]；身体某部分的疼痛[不适]；

sent.orig: Low back pain and knee pain accounted for most of the chronic pain complaints.
sent.trans: 腰痛和膝关节痛在慢性疼痛中占绝大部分。

sent.orig: The pain in patients with traumatic craniocerebral injury include acu t pain and chronic pain.
sent.trans: 颅脑外伤病人的疼痛问题包括急性疼痛和慢性疼痛。

sent.orig: Arthritis pain therefore makes an ideal model for comparing common clinical pain with experimental pain.
sent.trans: 因此我们将关节痛作为理想的临床疼痛模型与试验诱发的疼痛进行比较。

sent.orig: Pain relief acid bottom of the lumbar pain, pain associated with microgastropods falling, Leucorrhea increase.
sent.trans: 痛感为腰底部酸困疼痛，伴有小腹坠疼、白带增多。

sent.orig: Bone and joint pain: back pain, heel pain, knee joint, lumbar disc herniation.
sent.trans: 骨关节痛：腰腿痛，颈椎间盘突出症，足跟痛，膝关节炎，腰椎间盘突出症。
